contents: 1. leaves 3b-77a: Sharḥ mushkilāt al-Futūḥāt al-Makkīyah wa-fatḥ al-abwāb al-mughlaqah min al-ʻulūm al-ladunīyah.
2. leaves 78a-95a: al-Kashf wa-al-bayān ʻan asrār al-adyān fī kitāb al-Insān al-kāmil wa-kāmil al-insān.
3. leaves 96a-116b: Rafʻ al-īhām wa-dafʻ al-ibhām ʻalá mawḍiʻayn fī al-Fatḥ al-rabbānī wa-al-fayḍ al-raḥmānī.
4. leaves 117a-126a: al-Tawfīq al-jalī bayna al-Ashʻarī wa-al-Ḥanbalī.
5. leaves 127a-139b: al-Shams ʻalá Janāḥ al-ṭāʼir fī maqām al-wāqif al-sāʼir.
6. leaves 140a-150b: al-Luʼluʼ al-maknūn fī ḥukm al-akhbār ʻammā sayakūn.
7. leaves 151a-156b: Taḥqīq al-dhawq wa-al-rashf fī maʻná al-mukhālafah al-wāqiʻah bayna ahl al-kashf.
8. leaves 157a-161a: Rafʻ al-ishtibāh ʻan ʻalamīyat ism Allāh.
9. leaves 162a-175a: Tathbīt qawāʻid al-arkān bi-an "Laysa fī al-imkan abdāʻ mimmā kān".
10. leaves 181b-187a: Rannat al-awtār fī jadāwil al-afkār fī fann al-mūsīqā.
11. leaves 189a-198b: Taqrīb al-fuhūm wa-al-ʻuqūl wa-al-afkār ilá mā warāʼa ṭawr al-ʻaql min al-aṭwār.
12. leaves 199b-212a: Sharḥ al-bāb al-thālith wa-al-sittūn min al-Insān al-kāmil.

title.@value: شرح مشكلات الفتوحات المكية وفتح الابواب المغلقة من العلوم اللدنية.
Sharḥ mushkilāt al-Futūḥāt al-Makkīyah wa-fatḥ al-abwāb al-mughlaqah min al-ʻulūm al-ladunīyah ... [etc.].

subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
